name: Tub Sub
description:
Its been a strange birthday for you this year. Those crazy relatives have done it yet again by getting you a literal army of rubber ducks they bought online somewhere. Its time for a wash and you might as well put the little army to use. 

With your trusty toy submarine, shoot down the army of ducks and free the tub from their ducky grasp!

Only the mightiest will slay the ultimate duck!

FOR BEST PERFORMANCE PLAY FULLSCREEN

This game uses a wave based system, with a final boss at the end. Try to see if you can reach and even beat the mega top hat duck!
